note.p: Research Field: Astronomy, geodesy, history of astronomy
Education: Studied langauges under the Jesuits, then under the poet Jacques Delille; later studied under the astronomer Lalande
Career: Worked with PFA Mechain (FRS 1789) measuring the arc of the meridian between Dunkirk and Barcelona (1792-1799); Professor of Astronomy, College de France (1807)
